reviewText: I used this for seniors with dementia and it worked really well. They watched the video and sang and along and played tamborines and maracas and stuff along with it--a few times over!
I am very pleased with this great DVD especially since it has great stories for children, and teachers, like me, can use it in the classroom.  It was a great buy!

This is a great DVD for the holidays.  Our granddaughter enjoyed it over and over during her visit with us.  Actually we have purchased several Scholastic videos and have been pleased with all of them.
This was a gift to a special, a very special, person. She told me it was wonderful.
